Wisconsin's blend of industrial heritage, agricultural tradition, and emerging tech sectors creates a diverse economy rooted in Midwestern values. Vouch Mobile keeps Badger State residents connected from Milwaukee's breweries to Madison's tech startups—at a price as sensible as Wisconsin cheese.

Network

AT&T Coverage in Wisconsin

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Wisconsin residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Badger State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Wisconsin, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Benefits

Why Wisconsin Residents Choose Vouch

Wisconsin's average phone bill of $108/month doesn't align with the state's practical values—Vouch cuts that by 72%.

Whether you're commuting on I-94, working at Epic in Madison, or enjoying the Northwoods, you need reliable coverage.

No credit check means UW students, new Wisconsin residents, and dairy industry workers can sign up instantly.

AT&T's network covers Wisconsin from Milwaukee to Superior, with strong coverage along the I-94 and I-43 corridors.

    Wisconsin Coverage Questions

    Everything you need to know about Vouch Mobile in Wisconsin

    Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% population coverage across Wisconsin using AT&T's network. From Milwaukee to Madison, Green Bay to La Crosse, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout the Badger State.

    Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Wisconsin. AT&T provides strong coverage in Milwaukee, Madison, and throughout the state's major population centers.

    Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Wisconsin. The average Wisconsinite pays $108/month for phone service, so you could save over $936 per year by switching to Vouch.

    No credit check required. Whether you're a UW-Madison student, a new Wisconsin resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly.

    Switching is easy: check that your phone is unlocked, order a free Vouch SIM card shipped to your Wisconsin address, then activate online in minutes. You can keep your existing phone number—we'll handle the port.

    Yes! 5G is available in Milwaukee, Madison, Green Bay, Kenosha, Racine, and other Wisconsin cities. Your 5G access is included free with your $30/month plan.

    Absolutely. Lambeau Field and the Green Bay area have excellent coverage, keeping you connected during tailgates and game days throughout the season.

    AT&T's network covers most resort communities and highways in Northern Wisconsin. Some very remote areas may have limited coverage, but popular destinations like Wisconsin Dells and Door County have reliable service.
